DataElement.preferredName: Superficial Disease or Disorder Recurrence Diagnosis Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator related to diagnosis of superficial disease from recurrence.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Superficial Disease or Disorder Recurrence Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to diagnosis of superficial disease from recurrence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of little substance or significance; involving only a surface.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Of little substance or significance; involving only a surface.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: To occur again.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves
